it.univr.GameOfLife.Cell

    • Uses of Cell in it.univr.GameOfLife

      Fields in it.univr.GameOfLife declared as Cell 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Cell[][] GenThreadsNextGeneration.first
      Instantiates the main boolean Cell array.
      private Cell[][] Core.first
      Creates a new Cell array of cells.
      private Cell[][] GenThreadsNextGeneration.last
      Instantiates the auxiliary array that will be used for calculating next generation.

      Constructors in it.univr.GameOfLife with parameters of type Cell 
      Constructor and Description
      GenThreadsNextGeneration(int numOfThreads, Cell[][] other)
      This constructor initializes the "first" and "last" array, copies other in first, creates the threads and waits their finish.
